verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> Brotherly Love <S%G5360><s%> Let Abide; <S%G3306><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Of Hospitality <S%G5381><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Be Forgetful <S%G1950><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> For By This <S%G1063><s%> Unawares <S%G2990><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Entertained <S%G3579><s%> Angels. <S%G32><s%>

Be Mindful <S%G3403><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Prisoners, <S%G1198><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Bound With Them; <S%G4887><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Evil Treated, <S%G2558><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Yourselves <S%G846><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Body. <S%G4983><s%>

Honourable Let <S%G5093><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Marriage Be Held <S%G1062><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every Way, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bed Be <S%G2845><s%> Undefiled; <S%G283><s%> Fornicators <S%G4205><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adulterers <S%G3432><s%> <S%G2919><s%> <S%G2919><s%> Will Judge <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Without Love Of Money Let Your <S%G866><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Manner Of Life Be, <S%G5158><s%> Satisfied <S%G714><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Present Circumstances ; <S%G3918><s%> He <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Has Said, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Will I Leave, <S%G447><s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Nor In Any Wise <S%G3361><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Will I Forsake. <S%G1459><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> <S%G2292><s%> <S%G2248><s%> We May Boldly Say, <S%G3004><s%> The Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> A Helper, <S%G998><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Will Not Be Afraid : <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What Shall Do <S%G4160><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Man? <S%G444><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2233><s%> Your Leaders, <S%G5216><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> Of Whom, <S%G3739><s%> Considering <S%G333><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Issue <S%G1545><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Their Conduct, <S%G391><s%> Imitate <S%G3401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Yesturday <S%G5504><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Same, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

With Teachings <S%G1322><s%> Various <S%G4164><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strange <S%G3581><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Carried About; <S%G4064><s%> <S%G2570><s%> For It Is Good For <S%G1063><s%> With Grace <S%G5485><s%> To Be Confirmed <S%G950><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart. <S%G2588><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Meats; <S%G1033><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Were Profited <S%G5623><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Walked Therein . <S%G4043><s%>

We Have <S%G2192><s%> An Altar <S%G2379><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Have Not <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> Serve; <S%G3000><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> For Of Those Whose <S%G1063><s%> Is Brought <S%G1533><s%> Animals <S%G2226><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Blood As Sacrifices <S%G129><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holies <S%G39><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest, <S%G749><s%> Of These <S%G5130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bodies <S%G4983><s%> Are Burned <S%G2618><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Camp. <S%G3925><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Sanctify <S%G37><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gate <S%G4439><s%> Suffered : <S%G3958><s%>

Therefore <S%G5106><s%> We Should Go Forth <S%G1831><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Camp, <S%G3925><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3680><s%> His Reproach <S%G846><s%> Bearing; <S%G5342><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> An Abiding <S%G3306><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming One <S%G3195><s%> We Are Seeking For. <S%G1934><s%>

' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> We Should Offer <S%G399><s%> The Sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> Of Praise <S%G133><s%> Continually <S%G1275><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of The Lips <S%G5491><s%> Confessing <S%G3670><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> To His Name. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Of Doing Good <S%G2140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Communicating <S%G2842><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Forgetful, <S%G1950><s%> <S%G5108><s%> For With Such <S%G1063><s%> Sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> Is Well Pleased <S%G2100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Obey <S%G3982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2233><s%> Your Leaders, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Submissive : <S%G5226><s%> <S%G846><s%> For They <S%G1063><s%> Watch <S%G69><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Your Souls, <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Account <S%G3056><s%> About To Render; <S%G591><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> They May Do, <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Groaning <S%G4727><s%> <S%G255><s%> For Unprofitable <S%G1063><s%> For You Would Be <S%G5213><s%> This. <S%G5124><s%>

Pray <S%G4336><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Us : <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3982><s%> For We Are Pursuaded, <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Good <S%G2570><s%> Conscience <S%G4893><s%> We Have, <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> To Conduct Ourselves. <S%G390><s%>

<S%G4056><s%> But More Abundantly <S%G1161><s%> I Exhort You <S%G3870><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> More Quickly <S%G5032><s%> I May Be Restored <S%G600><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And The God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace, <S%G1515><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Brought Again <S%G321><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherd <S%G4166><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great One <S%G3173><s%> In The Power Of The <S%G1722><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>

Perfect <S%G2675><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> His Will <S%G846><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> To Whom Be <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

<S%G3870><s%> But I Exhort <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Bear <S%G430><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> In <S%G1223><s%> Few Words <S%G1024><s%> I Wrote <S%G1989><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> Has Been Released; <S%G630><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Whom, <S%G3739><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Sooner <S%G5032><s%> He Should Come, <S%G2064><s%> I Will See <S%G3700><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2233><s%> Your Leaders, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints. <S%G40><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Italy. <S%G2482><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Grace Be <S%G5485><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Hebrews <S%G1445><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Italy, <S%G2482><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Timothy. <S%G5095><s%>
